full_title: Talk talk featuring troye sivan by Charli xcx & Troye Sivan
title: Talk talk featuring troye sivan

description.plain:
“Talk talk featuring Troye Sivan” is a remix of ”Talk talk” off of the deluxe version of Charli’s sixth studio album, BRAT. In this release, Charli built anticipation around the potential collaboration, with fans eagerly speculating on who the featured artist might be.

Charli first teased the track on September 3rd, posting a photo of herself with a male body, both wearing shirts that say “ABOUT FUCKING TIME!”



In line with her playful and teasing nature, Charli left fans guessing about the details of the project. Although the identity of the collaborator was not revealed at the time, many fans speculated that British singer Dua Lipa might also be involved, especially after a similar shirt was seen on Dua’s Instagram story.



Later, on September 8th, Charli dropped another tease on her private instagram account 360_brat, being a voice-memo of Dua Lipa saying “Charli, Troye, un gran besito para ti mwuah,“ subsequently confirming Troye Sivan is also on the remix.

The remix was officially announced on September 11, 2024 via Twitter, revealing that while Troye Sivan is a main feature, Dua Lipa will contribute as additional vocals, contrary to earlier assumptions.

embed_content: Read “Talk talk featuring troye sivan” by Charli xcx & Troye Sivan on Genius
